# Directories
RAW_DATA_KWB = <RAW_DIR>/test-project/KWB
FLOW_DIR = <RAW_DATA_KWB>/flows
SAMPLE_DIR = <RAW_DATA_KWB>/samples

# CSV Files
FLOW_CSV = <FLOW_DIR>/<FLOW_SUBDIR_CURRENT>/flows.csv
